docTitle.titlePart:
ON THE K ¨
AHLER STRUCTURES OVER QUOT SCHEMES, II

front.div:
Abstract. Let X be a compact connected Riemann surface of genus g, with g ≥ 2,
and let O X denote the sheaf of holomorphic functions on X. Fix positive integers r and
d and let Q(r, d) be the Quot scheme parametrizing all torsion coherent quotients of O
⊕r
X
of degree d. We prove that Q(r, d) does not admit a Kähler metric whose holomorphic
bisectional curvatures are all nonnegative.
front.keywords:
Key words and phrases. Quot scheme, holomorphic bisectional curvature, automorphism, Albanese
map.

byline.affiliation: School of Mathematics, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research,
Indian Institute of Science, Department of Mathematics,
